00067 namespace std {} using namespace std;
00068 #include <EALib/cma2004.h>
00069 #include <ReClaM/Paraboloid.h>
00070 #include <iomanip>
00071 #include <Array/ArrayOp.h>
00072 
00073 #ifdef __SOLARIS__
00074 #include <values.h>
00075 #else
00076 #include <limits>
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 #include <EALib/sqr.h>
00080 double sphere(const vector<double> &v, double cond) {
00081   double sum = 0.;
00082   for(unsigned i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) 
00083     sum += sqr(pow(cond, double(i) / double(v.size() - 1)) * v[i]);
00084   return sum;
00085 } 
00086 
00087 bool isFeasible(const vector<double> &c) {
00088   return true;
00089 }
00090 
00091 int main() {
00092   unsigned i, j;
00093   //
00094   // fitness function
00095   //
00096   const unsigned Dimension  = 100;
00097   const unsigned a          = 100;  // determines problem condition
00098   const bool     rotate     = true;
00099   Paraboloid parabel(Dimension, a);
00100   parabel.init(0, 0., 0., rotate);
00101 
00102   //
00103   // EA parameters
00104   //
00105   const unsigned Iterations     = 1000;
00106   const double   MinInit        = -3.;
00107   const double   MaxInit        = 7.;
00108   const double   GlobalStepInit = 1.;
00109 #ifndef __SOLARIS__
00110   const double   Worst          = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00111 #else
00112   const double   Worst          = MAXDOUBLE;
00113 #endif
00114 
00115   //
00116   // strategy parameters
00117   //
00118   CMA2004 cma;
00119 
00120   unsigned Lambda             = cma.suggestLambda(Dimension);
00121   unsigned Mu                 = cma.suggestMu(Lambda);
00122 
00123   unsigned feasible;
00124 
00125   cerr << "(" << Mu << "/" << Mu << ", " << Lambda << ")-CMA-ES on " 
00126        << Dimension << "-dimensional paraboloid" << endl;
00127     
00128   //
00129   // initialize random number generator
00130   //
00131   Rng::seed(10);
00132 
00133   //
00134   // define parent populations
00135   //
00136   Population parents (Mu,     
00137                       ChromosomeT< double >( Dimension ),
00138                       ChromosomeT< double >( Dimension ));
00139 
00140   //
00141   // define offspring population
00142   //
00143   Population offsprings (Lambda,     
00144                          ChromosomeT< double >( Dimension ),
00145                          ChromosomeT< double >( Dimension ));
00146 
00147   //
00148   // we want to minimize the target function
00149   //
00150   offsprings.setMinimize( );
00151   parents   .setMinimize( );  
00152 
00153   //
00154   // initialize parent populations center of gravity
00155   //
00156   cerr << "init in CMA" << endl;
00157 
00158   static_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[0][0] ).initialize(MinInit, MaxInit);
00159 
00160   for(j = 1; j < parents.size( ); ++j ) 
00161     static_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >(parents[j][0]) =
00162       static_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >(parents[0][0]);
00163 
00164   bool stop = false;
00165   cout << 0 << " "  
00166        << sphere(dynamic_cast< vector< double >& >(parents[0][0]), a) << endl;
00167 
00168 
00169   //
00170   // strategy parameters
00171   //
00172 
00173   vector< double > variance( Dimension );
00174   for(i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) variance[i] = 1.;
00175 
00176   cma.init(Dimension, variance, GlobalStepInit, parents, CMA2004::superlinear, CMA2004::rankmu); 
00177   //cma.init(Dimension, variance, GlobalStepInit, parents, CMA::linear, CMA::rankmu); 
00178 
00179   // the previous three lines are equal to 
00180   //
00181   // cma.init(Dimension, 1., parents);
00182   //
00183   // but demonstrate how the CMA can be initialized with different variances
00184 
00185   //
00186   // iterate
00187   //
00188   for( unsigned t = 0; t < Iterations; ++t ) {
00189     //
00190     // generate at least Mu + 1 feasible new offsprings
00191     //
00192     feasible = 0;
00193     for(unsigned k = 0; k < offsprings.size( ); k++ ) {
00194       do {
00195         cma.create(offsprings[k]);
00196         if(isFeasible(dynamic_cast< vector< double >& >(offsprings[k][0]))) {
00197           feasible++;
00198           offsprings[k].setFitness(sphere(dynamic_cast< vector< double >& >(offsprings[k][0]), a));
00199           break;
00200         } else {
00201           offsprings[k].setFitness(Worst);
00202         }
00203       } while(feasible < Mu + 1);
00204     }
00205     
00206     //
00207     // select (mu,lambda) or (mu+lambda)
00208     //
00209     parents.selectMuLambda(offsprings, 0u);
00210   
00211     //
00212     // update strategy parameters
00213     //
00214     cma.updateStrategyParameters(parents);
00215 
00216     if((!stop) && (parents.best( ).fitnessValue( ) < 10E-10)) {
00217       stop = true;
00218       cerr << "stop: " << (t + 1) * Lambda << endl;
00219     }
00220       
00221     cout << setprecision(14) <<  (t + 1) * Lambda << " "  << parents.best( ).fitnessValue( ) << endl;//" " << cma.getCVar() << endl;
00222   }
00223   return 0;
00224 }
